vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.36.27;
son of: Ezer (H0687);
brother of: Bilhan (H1092) and Zaavan (H2190)
Also named: a.qan (עֲקָן "Akan" H6130)
§ Jakan = "let him oppress them"
an Edomite
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞干 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "讓他壓迫他們"
以東人 #代上 1:42|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚干 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "让他压迫他们"
以东人 #代上 1:42|
